word_mean: 天疱疮：以一批批连续发生大疱为特征的一组疾病，其类型以定语表明，单用常指寻常天疱疮

sentence.Network_en: Methods: leflunomide was added to 30 cases of pemphigus vulgaris reducing corticosteroids.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法: 给30例皮质激素减量困难的寻常型天疱疮患者加用来氟米特口服.

sentence.Network_en: Objective describe the clinical and pathological features of pemphigus.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:分析天疱疮的临床和病理特性.

sentence.Network_en: Secondary infection was common indirect cause of death of pemphigus and pemphigoid.
sentence.Network_cn: 继发感染为天疱疮、类天疱疮共同的间接死因.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 天疱疮（pemphigus）是由于表皮棘层细胞间抗体沉积引起棘层细胞松解、表皮内水疱形成为特征的自身免疫性皮肤黏膜大疱病。组 …
全民健康保险重大伤病范围 ... 8.贝赛特氏病 BEHCET'S DISEASE 天孢疮 PEMPHIGUS 乾燥症 SJOGREN'S SYNDROME.
...perviscosity syndrome) • 天泡疮(pemphigus) • 血栓性血小板减少紫斑症(TTP) • 肺出血肾炎症候群(Goodpasture’s syndrome) • 药.

list.abs: 疱疮的分类(五)疱疹样天疱疮(pemphigus herpetiformis)基本损害为绿豆或更大的水疱。虽然也是表皮内疱，但疱壁较紧张，棘刺松解征不明显。损害常排列呈环状或多环.
米库里刺病 Mikulicz's disease寻常天疱疮 pemphigus vulgaris异形牙 heterodont
瘢痕性类天疱疮(cicatricial pemphigoid)又称良性黏膜类天疱疮(benign mucosal pemphigoid)、眼天疱疮(ocular pemphigus),是一组慢性大疱性疾病,能导致结膜和黏膜瘢痕.
...嗜酸性脓疱性毛囊炎 eosinophilic pustular folliculitis副肿瘤天疱疮 paraneoplastic pemphigus类天疱疮 pemphigoid

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek pemphix, pemphig- 'bubble'

means.word_mean: 1. a skin disease characterized by large thin-walled blisters (bullae) arising from normal skin or mucous membrane
